messages.content: I live in Palermo Soho, Buenos Aires. The wide boulevards and steakhouse aromas.
That sounds wonderful! What do you enjoy most about living there?
Every Saturday I love asado at a local parrilla then browsing Plaza Serrano craft fair.
That sounds like a great weekend routine!
My neighbor Diego, a tango instructor who teaches me milonga steps. We've become good friends.
It's nice to have friendly neighbors!
For breakfast I usually have medialunas and cortado at a classic confitería.
Sounds delicious!
I'm relocating to Phibsborough, Dublin for a teaching position!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be browsing the book stalls at Dublin's Liberties then pint at a local pub.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have full Irish and Barry's tea at the corner café.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Phibsborough, Dublin for a few weeks now. I love the Georgian doors and canal walks.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Seamus, a retired teacher who tells wild stories about old Dublin.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Jordaan, Amsterdam for a company transfer!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be visiting Noordermarkt for organic cheese and flowers.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have stroopwafel and espresso at Winkel 43.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Jordaan, Amsterdam for a few weeks now. I love the narrow houses and canal bridges.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Anna, who has a houseboat and takes me on canal trips.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Ponsonby, Auckland for a startup opportunity!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be browsing Ponsonby Road boutiques then walking to Western Springs park.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have flat white and eggs benedict at Dizengoff.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Ponsonby, Auckland for a few weeks now. I love the volcanic hills and harbour views.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Aroha, a Maori artist who teaches me about local culture and history.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Bandra, Mumbai for a research fellowship!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be morning walk on Bandstand Promenade then chaat at Elco Market.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have vada pav and cutting chai at the corner tapri.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Bandra, Mumbai for a few weeks now. I love the sea-facing Art Deco buildings and street food stalls.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Priya, a Bollywood choreographer who invites me to dance rehearsals.
What a wonderful connection!
I'm relocating to Sultanahmet, Istanbul for a consulting contract!
That's exciting! What are you looking forward to?
My Saturday routine will be exploring the Grand Bazaar then tea at a rooftop overlooking the Bosphorus.
Sounds amazing!
I hear the breakfast scene is great — I plan to have simit and Turkish tea from the street cart near the Blue Mosque.
You'll love it there!
I've been in Sultanahmet, Istanbul for a few weeks now. I love the call to prayer echoing over the minarets.
How are you settling in?
Great! My neighbor Elif, a ceramicist who teaches me İznik tile painting.
What a wonderful connection!

queries.question: Who is my neighbor based on where I live now?

reference_answer.text: Since you currently live in Sultanahmet, Istanbul, your neighbor is Elif, a ceramicist who teaches me İznik tile painting. The answer should NOT mention neighbors from your previous cities (Palermo Soho Diego, Phibsborough Seamus, Jordaan Anna, Ponsonby Aroha, Bandra Priya).
